name: Luke Weidner
about: Head of Engineering at Vertice AI and full-stack senior software engineer. Passionate about learning through hands-on experiences and delivering elegant solutions. Experienced in software architecture, web development, and entrepreneurial ventures. Enjoys building innovative products and fostering collaboration.
